## A `{leaflet}` map

```{r}
#| fig-pos: "center"
  
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)

leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  setView(lat = 41.16, lng = -8.63, zoom = 13) %>%
  widgetframe::frameWidget(width = "110%", height = 1000)

```
